attributes.action: Ensure that the BBC reports impartially regardless of Religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is wide spread concern the BBC is using OUR money to promote and report favourably about a particular religion.

We are simply asking for IMPARTIAL reporting with OUR money. Say things as they are, if your not going to say things to offend one particular religion do the same for the others.
